name: Cubelicious
description:
Yep this is my first game, This was my very first interaction with unity so I need no money and yoou just play it :D oh and btw the only quit option is to play it from the start to the end.. Just to add a bit more salt to the wounds :D

And I already made the game into a setup exe version. I know these  types of files are  really  shady looking but  i'm an honest man (well more like a 18 year old student but whatever...) so dont worry :)
